document.full_text: a man believed to be umar patek, who is accused of having played a key role in the deadly 2002 bali bombing, was arrested by pakistan earlier this month.
document.title: indonesia headed to pakistan to identify possible bali bombing suspect
lines_and_colors: a man believed to be umar patek, who is accused of having played a key role in the deadly 2002 bali bombing, was arrested by pakistan earlier this month.
